Title: Trading Places
Plot: Louis Winthorpe is a businessman who works for commodities brokerage firm of Duke and Duke owned by the brothers Mortimer and Randolph Duke. Now they bicker over the most trivial of matters and what they are bickering about is whether it's a person's environment or heredity that determines how well they will do in life. When Winthorpe bumps into Billy Ray Valentine, a street hustler and assumes he is trying to rob him, he has him arrested. Upon seeing how different the two men are, the brothers decide to make a wager as to what would happen if Winthorpe loses his job, his home and is shunned by everyone he knows and if Valentine was given Winthorpe's job. So they proceed to have Winthorpe arrested and to be placed in a compromising position in front of his girlfriend. So all he has to rely on is the hooker who was hired to ruin him.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
Stars: Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche
Tagline: They're not just getting rich... They're getting even.

Similars.Title: Coming to America
Similars.Plot: An extremely pampered African prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and strong will.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Paul Bates, Garcelle Beauvais

Similars.Title: Beverly Hills Cop
Similars.Plot: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton

Similars.Title: The Golden Child
Similars.Plot: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child whom dark forces want to eliminate.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, J.L. Reate, Charles Dance

Similars.Title: Beverly Hills Cop II
Similars.Plot: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Jürgen Prochnow

Similars.Title: 48 Hrs.
Similars.Plot: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.
Similars.Stars: Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy, Annette O'Toole

Similars.Title: The Nutty Professor
Similars.Plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn

Similars.Title: Harlem Nights
Similars.Plot: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Richard Pryor, Redd Foxx

Similars.Title: The Blues Brothers
Similars.Plot: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.
Similars.Stars: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway

Similars.Title: Beverly Hills Cop III
Similars.Plot: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.
Similars.Stars: Eddie Murphy, Jon Tenney, Joey Travolta

Similars.Title: Spies Like Us
Similars.Plot: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.
Similars.Stars: Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd, Mark Stewart

Similars.Title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
Similars.Plot: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.
Similars.Stars: Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins

Similars.Title: National Lampoon's Animal House
Similars.Plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.
Similars.Stars: John Belushi, Karen Allen, Tom Hulce
